Package JavaApi.Samplers.QuerySamplers

Interface Summary
IQuerySampler An interface for a Query Result Sampler, called q-sampler for short, which chooses a matching from the set of results which are returned from applying a query pattern on a labeled graph.
 

Class Summary
QueryWrapper A wrapper class for query management (execution and sampling results)
StdQuerySampler An abstract class which implements portions of the IQuerySampler interface which returns a random matching from the set of results which are returned from applying a query pattern on a labeled graph.
StdQuerySamplerFactory A factory for creating IQuerySampler instances according to the smapling-mode set in the given QueryWrapper
StdQuerySamplerNoRepImpl A specific implementation of the StdQuerySampler abstract class which will return results without repetitions
StdQuerySamplerWithRepImpl A specific implementation of the StdQuerySampler abstract class which will return results with repetitions
